<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <locale xml:lang="en">
        <options>
            <option name="punctuation-in-quote" value="true"/>
        </options>
    </locale>
    <citation>
        <layout suffix=".">
            <names variable="author" suffix=", ">
                <name form="short"/>
            </names>
            <text variable="title" quotes="true" suffix=", "/>
            <date variable="issued">
                <date-part name="year"/>
            </date>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
